Ну это вторая халфа.
Игра, которая старше некоторых пользователей стима.
Игра, кторорая перевернула представление о играх.
Игра, которая совершила революцию в графике.
Игра, которая представила один из самых гибких и оптимтзированых движков (на нем к примеру работает apex или titanfall).
Игра, из-за которой мы ждём новою часть уже более 15 лет. И вот она скоро выдет
А мы верим и ждём.
Верим и ждём

Este título es un ícono de los videojuegos de PC, y no en balde. Tiene una buena historia, y una jugabilidad sencilla pero práctica. Cada parte es diferente a la anterior, sin embargo nunca se pierde la continuidad. La historia te atrapa.

Recomendado comprar en rebajas. Pero hacelo, posta, es un excelente juego.
A masterpiece in game design. It's only low point is the weak shooting mechanics.
Que recuerdos!!! es un juegazo.... no hay mas que decir de la saga Half Life!!
Si no lo has jugado le has fallado a toda la comunidad
It is very fun and story driven. It (to me) has amazing and clean graphics even though it's very old. Great game and highly recommend.

When I first played it around 2005(ish) it seemed longer and harder.
Doesn't mean that it is super short and super easy - played it now on normal and still there were several times where I had to repeat from checkpoint because of ending with 1HP or getting nuked. 
There are only two things actually to complain about (if you really really find for things to complain):
1. not very balanced weapons + not very accurate weapons
2. shitty "companions"(?) - follow you around at some point and tend to block your way. but some of them give you healthpacks so it is nice...
 [a word of clarification: there are two extremely accurate guns which are revolver and crossbow. these are basically one-shot-one-kill type of guns if you aim correctly. unfortunately there is not so much ammo around to enjoy them fully by headshoting everybody like at high-noon or pinning enemies to the walls with red-hot-bolts of crossbow. The rifle and smg are common (ammo aswell) but their accuracy is shit. In addition - and that really makes me laugh - is that you need 1 crowbar hit to crack supply chest, but you need to unleash half your ammo clip (either handgun, smg or rifle) just to open them. However, it is enourmous pleasure to go all-ham with shotgun and smg/rifle killing everybody in John Wick style :)
TL:DR below
Besides annoying path-blocking NPC's and not very accurate rifles, it is fun.
One of the must-play games.
I recommend it!

Hoy me decidí a repetir la experiencia de rejugar el Half Life 2, algo que ya hice hace mucho tiempo. Esta vez con el control de Steam como nueva experiencia, de por si no bastan las palabras para describir este gran juego que con el paso del tiempo se ha vuelto un pilar de los FPS. Y con el control es un gran logro, despues de un rato se vuelve intuitivo, usarlo es muy preciso.

Despues de jugar su primera entrega, inmediatamente jugue la secuela, muy bien planteada la historia, y esos cambios drasticos de un juego a otro si se notaron mucho, jugabilidad, la forma de interaccion, sus graficos, todo me encanto y me gusto mucho, quiero que salga una tercera entrega aunque eso no vaya a pasar :(
A good game with a good story!
es half-life por que no lo jugarias?
Сюжет, физика и геймплей просто огонь!
It's Half Life 2 what do you want from me?

le jeux m ayant mit la plus grosse claque de toute ma vie , a l epoque j etait blufé du gameplay franchement mature et inteligeant , l ambience de sf super prenente et son moteur physique et graphique qui pour l epoque metait tout le monde d accord^^

For something that's on sale for 99 cents I would say this game Is a legend. The chapters are crafted extremely well and get progressively more tricky. I would say I like the plot but as someone who hasn't played Half Life 1 I cant say I know the plot well enough. Anyways I would give it an 12/10

one of the best fps games of the century. this game is still fresh to play 15 years after its release.

Super jeux, incroyablement captivant malgré le fait qu'il soit un peu vieux, il n'a pas du tout mal vielli c'est un plaisirs de joué a se jeux pour avoir sa dose de stresse et d'adrenaline.
On s'attache vite au personnages et l'histoire est super (en même temp c'est un jeux valve donc forcement il est bien)
Attention parfois si vous êtes trop impatient car avant de trouver comment avancer dans certaine partie du jeux il va falloire faire place a la reflexion,la patience et la recherche.
Super jeux je le conseille énormément.
this is the best game of all times. All hail Gordon Freeman.
крутая игры сюжет отличный тянет на слабые пк рекомендую всем
Half-life 1 was more fun but this was great too. Episode 1 and 2 may make up for it and make it match 1, I dunno yet.

Really cool game. Achivements are especially great for the ones who wants challenge. Believe me, going trough a entire chapeter with only the gravity gun, that chapter in particular, is a challenge you'll want to try.
